sql: I have experience working with relational and ORM databases. Postgres and SQL has been used in most of my larger projects. Planning smart database design to reduce redundancy or to promote efficiency is a process I enjoy to work on.
postgres: Postgres has been my relational database of choice, I am also confident in MySQL and Oracle. I have worked with Postgres for all my personal projects. his includes both my extensions, my school timetable management project and also various university projects for my database courses.
oracle: I have been working with Oracle daily at my current position and have become comfortable with interacting with objects and queries in Oracle.
